reviewText: When this TV movie debuted in 1984,  critics said it was the kind of production you expect to see in a feature film. It is high quality TV drama in many  aspects.  Lindsay Wagner,  at the peak of her career, gives an impecable performance. Joan Woodward and Richard Creena are incredible as well. Good this movie is finally available on DVD.
Saw this movie years ago. It was still good again.

I have always love this movie it was wonderful to find it on DVD. It shows the both sides of infidelity from the womans point of view but it is handled with such grace befitting the two actresses playing the parts.

This was a great find and a nice price. The story line was very good and well played By Miss Wagner and Miss Woodward. Not mention the supporting cast. A great story of betrayal, love, forgiveness and passions.
Saw this years ago, loved it.
I love this movie. I saw it years ago and I have been trying to find it for a long time. Thanks.
This is an excellent story. I waited a long time to find it available again.
if you're a Lindsay Wagner fan, you must get this movie..Very compelling movie with excellent scenes between the 2 leading ladies..it's a must
This is the most emotional movie in history and I love it so my favorite actress is Lindsay Wagner's acting so amazing and awesome and about time to release the movie! :) (y)
I Love Lindsay Wagner she is an awsome actress in this movie and all she does to provide entertainment to others.
